## Subsetting Data with `Filter`

Make a subset from the penguins data of just Adelies using `filter`

```{r}
#| include: false
filter(penguines, 
       species == 'Adelie')
```

Filter numerically ex/ by size

```{r}
penguines_sm <- filter(penguins, 
                       body_mass > 3600)
glimpse(penguines_sm)
```
Filter by multiple conditions
```{r}
penguines_sm <- filter(penguins, 
                       body_mass > 3600, 
                       species == "Adelie")
glimpse(penguines_sm)

```
Add `|` for or
```{r}
penguines_sm <- filter(penguins, 
                       body_mass > 3600, 
                       species == "Adelie" |
                         species == "Chinstrap")
```
